title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels [DVD][ISO][TORRENT][Eng/Spa]
description:
DVD '.iso' image.

Language: English/Spanish/French
Subtitles: Spanish/English/French/Dutch

Once you download the '.iso' file, you mount it with 'DaemonTools' or 'PowerIso' and play the movie as if it was an actual DVD. Hope you enjoy.

Summary.
A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.
